Text.Page:
Thulsa's scouts have us surrounded, and it's just a matter of time before more of Thulsa's minions show up.

Unless we strike first.

, repel the scout brigade and show them we won't give up ground without a fight!
You've not only saved Habere from Thulsa, but I think you just opened a supply route to the Remote Lodge, <PCNAME>. Thanks!
